text: Really good food, been here twice now and no disappointment yet !! Food is cooked fresh every time because u always have to wait, so call ahead, it's the best around so it gets quite busy..
Always the best Chinese food around Bolton and Nobleton!  Reasonable prices and good quality.
Very good Chinese food !!.... very pricey though. Been in nobleton forever !!! Been eating here for about 8 years now if not more. Super yummy just a lot of money
